main_definition: A sweet baked dessert typically made from flour, sugar, eggs, and flavorings like vanilla or chocolate.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiom for something very good or enjoyable
meanings_and_examples.example: Getting a promotion at work was no cake walk.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A metaphorical expression to represent the end of a task or process
meanings_and_examples.example: Now that the project is complete, we can put our nose to the grindstone and start on the next one.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiom used when someone fails to understand or comprehend something
meanings_and_examples.example: I don't know how he couldn't grasp such a simple concept. It was like talking to a wall.
